description:
Elizabeth comes to Yorozuya, but Katsura, who is always with her, isn`t there. Gintoki and the others are unsure how to treat Elizabeth. She doesn`t talk and is difficult to figure out. Shinpachi decides to serve her tea, but Elizabeth doesn`t react. He tries to serve her coffee next, but her attitude doesn`t change at all. Kagura decides to serve her a certain drink as a last resort. Upon being served that drink, Elizabeth quietly begins to shed tears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Croquette Bread Is Always Popular in Shops
In Kiosks sind Korokke am beliebtesten!
Uriden Dewa Yappa Croquette Pan ga Ichiban Ninki
売店ではやっぱコロッケパンが一番人気
